title: Add a Titlegetting a low prio queue because of a server bug issue
body: The champs has been selected and im in the loading screen. while im waiting it took so long and when i reconnected the gmae said "Thr game cannot be find" And i receive a low prio. Rito pleaseee!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!{{summoner:32}}

replies.body:
This sounded a bit strange, so I looked into this further and it looks like this wasn't a bug, but more of an issue with your connection to the server. An unstable connection can cause your client to not properly connect to a match and in some cases, it can crash your client entirely. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will address the most common solutions for this issue. 

Because disconnections negatively impact everyone in the match, regardless of the reason for the disconnection, [the system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats all disconnections equally. This is one of the reasons why penalties cannot be modified or removed. 

If you still encounter issues with disconnections after working through the guide, please let me know.
